title: Emerald Blossom Jhumkas: A Symphony of Tradition & Sparkle
features: Classic Jhumka design featuring intricate filigree work and CZ embellishments. The top portion showcases a pear-shaped emerald surrounded by a halo of shimmering CZs. Multiple pearl drops add a touch of elegance and movement. The jhumka body showcases openwork designs that adds to it's breathability.
occasions: and any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for upscale parties and events.
description: A timeless design reimagined for the modern woman. These Jhumkas seamlessly blend traditional South Indian aesthetics with contemporary sparkle. The high-quality Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine. The emerald and pearl combination adds a touch of regality. Durable and designed for comfortable wear.
